messages.user: Create a pull request using gh CLI to the upstream repository xpander-ai/website-slack-single-page from the fix-favicon-subpages branch. Use title: "Fix: Favicon not displaying on subpages" and body explaining that we changed the external favicon reference to use the local file.
messages.assistant:
Perfect! The pull request has been successfully created. Here's the PR URL: https://github.com/xpander-ai/website-slack-single-page/pull/4

The PR includes:
- **Title**: "Fix: Favicon not displaying on subpages"
- **Description**: Explains that the issue was caused by the external favicon reference in index.html and the fix updates it to use the local favicon file
- **Changes**: Updated `index.html` to use `/xpander-logo-purple.png` instead of the external `https://xpander.ai/favicon.svg`
